author: Manny Torres
comment: Pay $2 for a watch face only to realize that it's app is bombarding my phone with ads. And they cleverly enough tell you to wait up to 15 minutes for the watch face to appear on your watch which is what Google Play Store return window is for apps. After about 10 minutes the watch face still did not appear after disconnecting and reconnecting my watch multiple times and restarting my phone so I've decided to not take a chance and refund the app. I just had to come here and warn everyone
title: Beware this app will bombard you with ads even though you pay for their product! They also trick you into wasting your return window!

author: Jed Dye
comment: No option to change the time it takes to go into ambient mode

reply.author: DroiipD Watch Faces
reply.content: Kindly change it from the wear device settings

comment: Very beautiful indeed!!! Thank you so much!!!

author: Shahriyar Mansouri
comment: There has been shebangs with this developer and their previous updates. They listened and fixed what needed a fix. Now, this is one decent face for your watch should you need a beautiful look.

reply.author: DroiipD Watch Faces
reply.content: version 1.2 has fixed all the previous issue ! kindly update the application

title: A decent face for your androidwear

author: Michael Mills
comment: I love this face but the ambient mode drains my battery very fast. On my Huawei watch I see a day of life rather than 2 and a half.

reply.author: DroiipD Watch Faces
reply.content: There are some efficient ambient modes options in setting, you can try those if you want to improve battery drains . thanks

title: Ambient mode is far too bright.

title: Love it
